definition: Farouk of Egypt (1920-1965), king of Egypt 1936-1952
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: Faruk says they are threatened both by insurgent and government forces.
sentences.chinese: 法魯克說，他們受到暴亂分子和政府軍隊的雙重威脅。

sentences.english: Martyrdom Week marks the anniversary of the assassination of Maulvi Muhammad Farooq, a figure in the Kashmir separatist movement.
sentences.chinese: 殉難周是爲了紀念克什米爾分裂運動成員法魯克遇害。
